## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/roperefcountstring">RopeRefCountString</a> - This struct is allocated with &#39;new char&#91;&#93;&#39; from the heap, and represents a reference counted chunk of string data.

When its ref count drops to zero, it is delete&#91;&#93;&#39;d. This is primarily managed through the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ropepiece">RopePiece</a> class below.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h">RewriteRope.h</a>.
